revised_title: The Histology and Pigment Development in Chromatophores of Higher Crustacea
tldr: The authors investigate the histology and pigment development in the chromatophores of higher crustaceans, focusing on Hippolyte and Crangon species. They describe the distribution, structure, and pigments present in the chromatophores, as well as the process of pigment development and the role of light conditions in their formation.
